snippet.title: The Hex - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam ! http://store.steampowered.com/app/510420/The_Hex/

Coming to PC, Mac and Linux on October 16th 2018.

In a creaky old tavern, in a forgotten corner of the video-game universe, a storm is raging. An anonymous caller suggests that there is a murder plot. Six video game protagonists are the only plausible suspects...

Music and sound by Jonah Senzel:
https://twitter.com/JonahSenzel

http://www.the-hex.com/
